data.eml:eml: Entedoninae wasps (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Eulophidae) associated with ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) in tropical America, with new species and notes on their biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hansson, Christer, Lachaud, Jean-Paul, Perez-Lachaud, Gabriela (2011): Entedoninae wasps (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Eulophidae) associated with ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) in tropical America, with new species and notes on their biology. ZooKeys 134: 65-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1653, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1653
